description:
Lifeslide will take you on a thrilling flight through the ups and downs of a vibrant adventure. Take off as a paper plane and master a unique flight mechanic as you travel through ever-changing landscapes, each one more challenging than the last!

This is a story about life. Everything is implicitly told through the environment. Find your meaning or simply enjoy an atmospheric experience - this is your journey and you decide what to make of it. Along the way, an original score that combines electronic, rock and orchestral elements will keep you company.

The gameplay is simple! Up, Down, Left, Right is all you need to fly a paper plane. Beneath the simple controls, however is a blend between physics and arcade gameplay that will get under your skin as you get better. Every time you fail, you get the chance to improve your plane.

FEATURES:
- Fly through a dynamically changing world representing life itself
- Collect Matter and improve your paper plane's stats
- Unlock different planes and try out different flight styles
- Find secret places to unlock paper plane appearances
- Weekly challenges with leaderboards
- Endless Zen mode with randomized levels
name: Lifeslide
